name: Garbageman: Generations
description:
Garbageman: Generations is a 3D-based adventure/narrative game where the protagonist (player) is tasked to collect different types of waste that are scattered across multiple levels and to properly segregate them at the end of every level. The story will be told through the environment, as the player will be subjected to multiple generations of the garbageman’s family as the game progresses. The environment will also change as the player moves from generation to generation.

Controls:

W - Move forward

A - Move left

S - Turn around

D - Move right

E - Interact with interactables
